mapper.select: SELECT p.no, p.contents, p.requestDate, p.expectedDate, p.completeDate, p.projectType, p.registerDate, a.contents AS area, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pm.memberFk) AS memberFks, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT fo.storeFilename) AS storeFilenames, MAX(c.groupNo) AS commentMaxGno FROM projects p LEFT OUTER JOIN fileobjects fo ON p.no = fo.commonNo AND fo.tablename = 'projects' INNER JOIN project_member pm ON pm.projectFk = p.no INNER JOIN areas a ON a.no = p.areaFk LEFT OUTER JOIN comments c ON p.no = c.projectFk WHERE p.no = #{no} GROUP BY pm.projectFk, fo.commonNo, c.projectFk;
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO projects ( areaFk, contents, requestDate, expectedDate, completeDate, projectType ) VALUES ( #{areaFk}, #{contents}, #{requestDate}, #{expectedDate}, #{completeDate}, #{projectType} )
